mapper.sql: id, user_id, step_number, sport_date, sport_time, sport_distance, sport_average_speed, sport_url, sport_pattern, gmt_create
mapper.select: SELECT user_id,sport_date,SUM(step_number) AS total_sport_number, SUM(sport_time) AS total_sport_time, SUM(sport_distance) AS total_sport_distance, AVG(sport_average_speed) AS total_sport_average_speed FROM sys_sport WHERE TO_DAYS(gmt_create) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(step_number) AND SUM(sport_time) AND SUM(sport_distance) AND AVG(sport_average_speed)

SELECT user_id,sport_date,SUM(step_number) AS total_sport_number, SUM(sport_time) AS total_sport_time, SUM(sport_distance) AS total_sport_distance, AVG(sport_average_speed) AS total_sport_average_speed FROM sys_sport WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND TO_DAYS(gmt_create) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(step_number) AND SUM(sport_time) AND SUM(sport_distance) AND AVG(sport_average_speed)
